resources.string: Add additional repos to %s. This should be a URL that ends with \"index.min.json\".
Only works if the current chapter/episode + the next one are already downloaded.
Skip entries with unseen episode(s)/unread chapter(s)
Show unseen/unread count on Updates icon
Update progress when marked as read/watched
Clear episode/chapter cache on app launch
Are you sure? Completed episodes and chapters and progress of non-library entries will be lost
Also apply to all manga in my library
Also apply to all novels in my library

Warning: large bulk downloads may lead to sources becoming slower and/or blocking Aniyomi. Tap to learn more.

Preserve watch position on seen episodes
Only appears if the video has chapters

Remember and switch to the last used volume
Hide player controls when opening the player
Show system status bar with controls
AniSkip requires the anime to be tracked with MAL or Anilist to work
Disable AniSkip if video already contains chapters
Enable the use of PiP mode
Show episode toasts when switching episodes in PiP mode
Automatically switch to PiP mode on exiting the player
Replaces the "Skip 10 seconds" option with "Previous episode"
Always ask video quality on episode click
Swipe left or right to rewind or fast-forward
When enabled, seeking will not focus on keyframes, leading to slower but precise seeking
When a tap gesture is set to "Custom", it can be bound through input.conf. The key codes are 0x10001 for left, 0x10002 for center, and 0x10003 for right.
When a media control is set to "Custom", it can be bound through input.conf. The key codes are 0x10004 for previous, 0x10005 for play/pause, and 0x10006 for next.
May fix black screens on some video codecs, can also improve performance at the cost of quality
Subtitle language(s) to be selected by default on a video with multiple subtitles, Two- or three-letter languages codes work. Multiple values can be delimited by a comma.
Whitelist for subtitles. If a whitelist is defined, the first subtitle that contains a whitelisted word will be used. Multiple values can be delimited by a comma.
Blacklist for subtitles. If a blacklist is defined, all subtitles that contains a blacklisted word will be filtered out. Multiple values can be delimited by a comma.
Preferred languages, pitch correction, audio channels
Audio language(s) to be selected by default on a video with multiple audio streams, Two- or three-letter languages codes work. Multiple values can be delimited by a comma.
Prevents the audio from becoming high-pitched at faster speeds and low-pitched at slower speeds
Execute lua code with custom buttons
You have no custom buttons. Tap the plus button to create a custom button.
Do you wish to delete the button "%s"?
Edit and create new scripts and script options
Directory contains no items. Tap the plus button to add a new file.
You have unsaved changes. Do you still wish to go back?

Edit MPV input file for keyboard mapping configuration

Prevents the audio from becoming high-pitched at faster speeds and low-pitched at slower speeds

Compress images before downloading or loading in reader
Use data saver in the downloader
Higher values mean that a higher percentage of the image quality is saved, but it also means the file size is larger, 80 percent is a good median between file size and image quality
The Jpeg file size is considerably smaller then Webp is(meaning more data is saved), but it makes the images lose more quality as well.\nCurrently compresses to Jpeg
The Jpeg file size is considerably smaller then Webp is(meaning more data is saved), but it makes the images lose more quality as well.\nCurrently compresses to Webp
Bandwidth Hero (requires a Bandwidth Hero Proxy server)
